item.title: The Toroidal Structure of Pretending: Internal-External Flow
item.description: Exploring how toroidal geometry describes the relationship between internal states and external presentation

item.title: The First Observer and the Mirror: Information as Reality
item.description: When observation becomes creation, who observes first? Exploring the physics of seeing through walls and the spectrum of intelligence

item.title: The Planck Tube: Where Looking Becomes Touching
item.description: How the act of seeing changes what is seen, and why reality has a resolution limit

item.title: The Journey Into Market Microstructure: What We Discovered About Trading Systems
item.description: Starting with a 33% win rate MA crossover strategy on gold, this research revealed something unexpected about how markets actually work.

item.title: About This Research
item.description: Welcome to Theoretical Explorations - a space for rigorous thinking about markets, mathematics, and reality
